titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on certain chemicals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/10/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on: (1) halofuginone hydrobromide; (2) ethyl 2-(4-((6-chloro-2-benzoxazolyl) oxy)phenoxy) propanoate (fenoxapropethyl); and (3) methyl 5-(phenylthio)-2-benzimidazole carbamate (fenbendazole).
